item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers Ski Club is a not for profit organization that has been run by its members since being founded in 1956. Our members are mainly single professional adults in our 20's and 30's from the greater Boston area who love winter sports, the outdoors and especially having fun. We are always interested in meeting new people.

We are part of the Eastern Interclub Ski League with over 1000 members throughout the Mount Washington Valley. We participate in skiing and snowboarding in the winter, hiking in the White Mountains in the spring and fall and we organize a summer tubing trip on the Saco River every summer.

The Brettl-Hupfers maintain a lodge that sleeps over 50 people in Bartlett, NH within minutes of several ski areas. We also organize events throughout the winter and during the rest of the year with our members, guests and friends. This meetup group is a way to stay in touch and participate in the events we’ll organize throughout the season. If you’re over 21, come on up as a guest to one of our events.

*Members of the meetup are not necessarily members of the Brettl-Hupfers.  Please email any of the organizers to find out about club membership.*

21 plus only; no pets.
item.name: Brettl-Hupfers Ski & Sports Club
